page.title: 18Environment of Fauldhouse
page.content: This is a pleasant environment with many country walks .{Seven twelfths of this block are now covered by {coniferous forest.}In this forest a {country park}is being created with red gravel paths,ponds and a stream passes through which is dammed to make a deep pool at a{picnic area. The rest is farmland mainly used for grazing purposes.A few fields of barley are grown . The {Breich Burn skirts the golf course and meanders through part of the area.There are pleasant walks along its banks. The only form of{pollution}is the official rubbish tip at Falla Hill disused quarry. Now the environment is being further improved by the removal and flattening of old coal tips.
